00001 package QuotedString;
00002 @ISA = qw(Parser::String);
00003 
00004 sub new {
00005   my $self = shift; my ($equation,$value,$ref) = @_;
00006   my $str = $self->SUPER::new(@_);
00007   unless ($str->{equation}{context}{strings}{$str->{value}}) {
00008     $equation->Error("Missing close quote",$ref) if $str->{value} eq '"';
00009     $str->{value} =~ s/^"(.*)"$/$1/;
00010     $str->{value} =~ s/\\"/"/g;
00011     $str->{isQuoted} = 1;
00012   }
00013   return $str;
00014 }
00015 
00016 sub string {
00017   my $self = shift; my $string = $self->SUPER::string(@_);
00018   if ($self->{isQuoted}) {
00019     $string =~ s/"/\\"/g;
00020     $string = '"'.$string.'"';
00021   }
00022   return $string
00023 }

00025 sub enable {
00026   my $context = shift;
00027   QuotedString::enableQuotes($context);
00028   QuotedString::enableAdd($context);
00029 }

00031 sub enableQuotes {
00032   my $context = shift;
00033   $context->{parser}{String} = 'QuotedString';
00034   bless $context->{_strings}, 'QuotedString::Data';
00035   $context->strings->update;
00036 }
00037 
00038 sub enableAdd {
00039   my $context = shift;
00040   $context->operators->set('+' => {class=>"QuotedString::BOP::add"});
00041 }

00044 @ISA = qw(Parser::Context::Strings);

00046 sub update {
00047   my $self = shift;
00048   $self->SUPER::update;
00049   $self->{patterns}{'"(?:[^\\\\]|\\\\.)*?"|"'} = [10,'str'];
00050   $self->{context}->update;
00051 }

00056 sub checkStrings {
00057   my $self = shift;
00058   my $ltype = $self->{lop}->typeRef; my $rtype = $self->{rop}->typeRef;
00059   return 1 if $ltype->{name} eq 'String' && $rtype->{name} eq 'String';
00060   return $self->SUPER::checkStrings(@_);
00061 }

00063 sub _eval {
00064   my $self = shift;
00065   my $ltype = $self->{lop}->typeRef; my $rtype = $self->{rop}->typeRef;
